all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Verily, I say unto you that ye are chosen out of the world to declare my gospel with the sound of rejoicing, as with the voice of a trump.
Doctrine and Covenants 29:4
Quote of the Day
"If you want the branches of your testimony to grow and bear fruit, nourish the roots."
Dieter F. Uchtdorf | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
